LanguageData.VFEP.ChooseCurses.Desc: The more curses you select, the more pawns your storyteller will allow you to have, and the rarer big threat events will be.
LanguageData.VFEP.WarcasketText: When you press Accept, a crafter youâ€™ve chosen will bring the resources onto the frame and begin assembling a warcasket. The speed of the assembly depends on the crafting skill of your crafter. Once the process is completed, a warcasket will leave the platform. Be careful, as the pawn on the platform can still die of hunger when on the platform - you should prioritize the warcasket assembly over other tasks.
LanguageData.VFEP.ResearchText: Research more warcasket technology to unlock more armor pieces.
LanguageData.VFEP.NoWarcaskets: Research warcaskets to learn how to use the foundry.
LanguageData.VFEP.NotEnoughFuel: Not enough chemfuel for power jump.
LanguageData.VFEP.EntombInIncapableOfViolenceWarning: (Warning: {PAWN_nameDef} is not capable of violence, it will make {PAWN_objective} useless.)
